TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MessageVersion extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定與訊息及其交換相關聯的 SOAP 和 WS-Addressing 版本。

span.span: Specifies the versions of SOAP and WS-Addressing associated with a message and its exchange.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ，其中包含有關 SOAP 信封和訊息所使用之定址通訊協定的版本控制資訊。The contains the versioning information both about the SOAP envelope and the addressing protocol that is used by a message. 的執行個體會在建立時繫結至特定的 ，其方式是將版本當做參數傳入其中一個 多載。An instance of is bound upon creation to a specific by passing the version as a parameter into one of the overloads. 此類別中的所有靜態 "get" 屬性 (例如 和 ) 都有類似列舉的語意 (Semantics)。All the static "get" properties in this class, such as and have enumeration-like semantics. 它們可提供 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 執行階段支援之可能訊息版本的列舉型別。They provide an enumeration of the possible message versions supported by the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] runtime. 訊息具有信封結構和定址結構。A message has an envelope structure and an addressing structure. 只是一起提供 {, } 的捷徑。 is just a shortcut for supplying {, } together. 目前有兩個可用的 SOAP 信封版本：SOAP 1.1 和 SOAP 1.2。There are currently two SOAP envelope versions available: SOAP 1.1 and SOAP 1.2. 這些 SOAP 版本是由 表示，而且會由 和 屬性傳回。These versions of SOAP are represented by and are returned by the and properties. 與 相關聯的 SOAP 版本可以使用 屬性進行復原。The version of SOAP associated with the can be recovered by using the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱的結構描述[SOAP 1.1](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96641)和[SOAP 1.2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96642)。For more information, see the schema for [SOAP 1.1](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96641) and [SOAP 1.2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96642). 目前有兩個 WS-Addressing 版本可用，There are currently two versions of WS-Addressing available. 也就是 2004 年 8 月 10 日提交的版本及 WS-Addressing 1.0 通訊協定中指定的版本。The one submitted on 10 August 2004 and the one specified in the WS-Addressing 1.0 protocol. 目前訊息版本所使用的位址版本可以使用 屬性加以修復。The address version used by the current message version can be recovered using the property. 這些 WS-Addressing 版本是由 表示，而且會由 和 屬性傳回。These versions of WS-Addressing are represented by and are returned by the and properties. 2004 年 8 月發表的 WS-Addressing 保留為舊版的值。The WS-Addressing August 2004 is retained as a legacy value. 10 August 2004 Ws-addressing 的 W3C Member Submission 位於[Web 服務定址 (Ws-addressing)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96643)。The 10 August 2004 W3C Member Submission for WS-Addressing is available at [Web Services Addressing (WS-Addressing)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96643). 17 2005 年 W3C Candidate Recommendation 的 Ws-addressing 1.0-核心位於[Web 服務定址 1.0-核心](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96644)。The 17 August 2005 W3C Candidate Recommendation for WS-Addressing 1.0 - Core is available at [Web Services Addressing 1.0 - Core](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96644). 支援使用 "plain old XML" (POX) 樣式的傳訊。 provides support for using "plain old XML" (POX)-style messaging. 啟用基本 POX 傳訊現在與在服務上設定 HTTP 繫結有關，其中包含使用 的文字編碼器。Enabling basic POX messaging is now a matter of setting up an HTTP binding on your service with a text encoder that uses . 可以使用指定版本的 WS-Addressing 和 SOAP (利用其中一個 多載) 來建立訊息版本物件。Message version objects can be created using specified versions of WS-Addressing and SOAP using one of the overloads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這些 WS-Addressing 版本是由 表示，而且會由 和 屬性傳回。These versions of WS-Addressing are represented by and are returned by the and properties. 2004 年 8 月發表的 WS-Addressing 保留為舊版的值。The WS-Addressing August 2004 is retained as a legacy value. 10 August 2004 Ws-addressing 的 W3C Member Submission 位於[Web 服務定址 (Ws-addressing)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96643)。The 10 August 2004 W3C Member Submission for WS-Addressing is available at [Web Services Addressing (WS-Addressing)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96643). 17 2005 年 W3C Candidate Recommendation 的 Ws-addressing 1.0-核心位於[Web 服務定址 1.0-核心](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96644)。The 17 August 2005 W3C Candidate Recommendation for WS-Addressing 1.0 - Core is available at [Web Services Addressing 1.0 - Core](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96644). ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageVersion#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageversion/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_UE_MessageVersion#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageversion/vb/module1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前可用的 SOAP 版本為 SOAP 1.1 和 SOAP 1.2。The SOAP versions currently available are SOAP 1.1 and SOAP 1.2. 包含與使用相關之資料的每一個 SOAP 版本都有 。There is an for each version of SOAP that contains the data relevant to its use. 目前有兩個 WS-Addressing 版本可用，There are currently two versions of WS-Addressing available. 一個是 2004 年 8 月 10 日提交的版本，另一個是 2005 年 8 月提交的版本 (稱為 WS-Addressing 1.0 通訊協定)。One submitted 10 August 2004 and the other submitted August 2005 and referred to as the WS-Addressing 1.0 protocol. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageVersion#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageversion/cs/program.cs#12)] [!code-vb[S_UE_MessageVersion#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageversion/vb/module1.vb#12)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是由 和 所組成。The consists of the and . 它支援使用 "plain old XML" (POX) 樣式的傳訊。This provides support for using "plain old XML" (POX)-style messaging. 啟用基本 POX 傳訊現在與在服務上設定 HTTP 繫結有關，其中包含使用 的文字編碼器。Enabling basic POX messaging is now a matter of setting up an HTTP binding on your service with a text encoder that uses . 請注意，當以 設定服務，而且 設定為 時，會從回應訊息中移除要求訊息內的動作標頭。Note that when a service is configured with the and the is set to , the action header in a request message is removed from the response message. 這與 ASMX 服務運作的方式一致。This is consistent with the way ASMX services work. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageVersion#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageversion/cs/program.cs#4)] [!code-vb[S_UE_MessageVersion#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageversion/vb/module1.vb#4)]
